title: Moxie Shorts are due on <strike>Friday</strike> Saturday!
body:
Hey guys and gals... sorry I haven't posted in awhile. I promise I'll write a nice juicy post in the near future, but in the meantime, this strictly informational one will have to do.

If you're working on a short film for Moxie Shorts 2007, the deadline is this Friday Saturday! Our last movie will end at 11:00 pm, so that will be the absolute latest we will accept entries. Good luck everyone!
author: Dan

comments.author: drm00se
comments.body: Guess I'm not participating this year.

comments.author: CinemaUntapped
comments.body: I am so excited about this.  I can't wait to see all the projects, even if nobody seems to want to talk about them here.

comments.author: dan
comments.body: The entries are starting to trickle in, but I imagine if it's anything like last year, we'll get the vast majority of them on Friday.

comments.author: Caleb
comments.body: Well it turns out the one I was going to submit (Aline's Holiday) is a few minutes too long. Plus I don't have it on a DVD without a menu, and don't have time to burn it! DAMN! Oh well, it's already played at the Moxie, so it's all good.

comments.author: nicole
comments.body: I heard we have a few music videos coming in, which I'm excited about.

comments.author: Cosmik
comments.body:
I hope the best of these shorts are youtubed (is that a verb?) so I can see them here too. I greatly enjoyed the shorts I saw last year.

(Yes, Brian, I've left that one wide open for you. HAH. That one too.) :)

comments.author: HonkeyHero
comments.body: I hope to have a trailer done by then... (before they show, not by friday...)

comments.author: drm00se
comments.body:
Posted By: CosmikI hope the best of these shorts are youtubed (is that a verb?)

It is now.

comments.author: thewayofthedinosaur
comments.body: Yeah i know for sure that one of the movies is an "official" MuteMath video

comments.author: nicole
comments.body: Woohooooooooooo!

comments.author: nicole
comments.body: Mute Math was on Conan last night.

comments.author: thewayofthedinosaur
comments.body: Yeah it's Nate Black and Brandon Goodwin's entry, it has  . . . wait . . . maybe they want it to be  surprise . . . never mind

comments.author: HonkeyHero
comments.body: yep, it's awesome... Talented fellows for sure

comments.author: Caleb
comments.body:
Posted By: thewayofthedinosaurYeah i know for sure that one of the movies is an "official" MuteMath video
That is flipping cool.

comments.author: CinemaUntapped
comments.body: So any word yet on schedule or show times?

comments.author: nicole
comments.body:
We'll be posting them later tonight. Almost finished!

And we watched them all this weekend. Wooowwweeee, they're good this year!

comments.author: CinemaUntapped
comments.body: I'm peeing my pants with excitement!

comments.author: dan
comments.body:
Ok, all the selected shorts fit into a perfect two hour slot, which means you can see all the shorts by coming to just one showing. And here they are:

Friday, November 16th @ 7:00 pm
Saturday, November 17th @ 4:30 pm
Sunday, November 18th @ 2:00 pm

There will be at least one (possibly more) audience awards.

comments.author: CinemaUntapped
comments.body: did I get in?

comments.author: Master RJ
comments.body: Do you want me to judge this year?

comments.author: dan
comments.body: Yeah you did. Your film was really well done too! There were only two documentaries this year (yours and another guy's), but we're still thinking of having a separate category for best doc, which means you'd have a 50/50 shot of winning that one. We'll have to discuss it a bit more. We'll announce all the categories later in the month.

comments.author: dan
comments.body: I think we might just do audience awards this year. If not, we'll let you know.

comments.author: thewayofthedinosaur
comments.body: YAy! I was hoping I wasn't going to miss out if I couldn't come on sunday!!! Now I know! Knowledge! owls!
